subject: Re: [junit] DataBase Testing
msgSnippet: So said  vivek srinivasan  on  2002-11-13 ... I think you are testing the wrong thing. Do not test the JDBC driver implementation for the database product
messageBody:
So said vivek srinivasan on 2002-11-13

>Hi Junitians,
>Thx for all the time and help in all my previous
>queries.This is question i have for a database unit
>testing.
>I have created a table called FlightInfo and stored
>data into it. What i need is to write a testcase to
>check for a null condition.ie if a null value is
>inserted into the database, it should "spit" out that
>error!!

I think you are testing the wrong thing. Do not test the JDBC driver implementation for the database product you're using.

An exercise: write in words the situation you're trying to avoid by adding error handling. Write in business terms, and not in programming terms.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
